definition: a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times, go after with the intent to catch
details:
noun
- a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times
= synonyms: domestic dog
- metal supports for logs in a fireplace
= synonyms: andiron, firedog
- a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
= synonyms: click
- a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked
= synonyms: frank, frankfurter, hotdog, hot dog, wiener, wienerwurst, weenie
- someone who is morally reprehensible
= example: someone who is morally reprehensible
= synonyms: hound
- informal term for a man
= example: informal term for a man
- a dull unattractive unpleasant girl or woman
= synonyms: frump
verb
- go after with the intent to catch
= synonyms: tag
